thread.title: North Carolina woman holds essay contest to give away farm | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: North Carolina woman holds essay contest to give away farm | Daily Mail Online

author: Associated Press
title: North Carolina woman holds essay contest to give away farm | Daily Mail Online
text: show ad A prize worth writing for: Widow is giving away her 13-acre organic farm to the winning couple of an 200-word essay contest Norma Burns is giving her farm in Bennett, North Carolina away to the winning couple of a 200-word essay contest Burns is giving up the farm in order to move back to Raleigh She ran the farm for 18 years, growing several organic crops including lavender It's estimated that the farm is worth $450,000 Submissions are due June 1 and the winners will be announced June 30 Published: 12:27 GMT, 1 February 2017 | Updated: 22:37 GMT, 1 February 2017 243 shares
